item.description:
The Enneagram is an amazing tool for any relationship building and it's particularly helpful for understanding your children and your children understanding you. No matter what your child's age from 4 to 60, you'll experience more clarity, relief and understanding about them. You'll learn very specific tools and communication strategies to relate to your children or parents in more effective ways. Possibly bring your children (though talk to me first). Herb can generally type your children in absentia.


Herb Pearce, M.Ed. in Counseling, is a therapist, personal life coach and workshop leader, trainer in organizations. He has been practicing 30 years and is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram and soon to be "Herb's Tips for Living."

www.herbpearce.com, herb@herbpearce.com,
781 648 3737

7:00-9:30pm

$40, sliding scale to $20
item.name: Enneagram and Parenting
